descriptions.400: The request didn't quite work out. Try checking things and giving it another go!
descriptions.401: You'll need to sign in first. It's quick and easy!
descriptions.402: This content needs payment. No big deal, just a heads up!
descriptions.403: This area is off limits right now. Try somewhere else maybe?
descriptions.404: Looks like this page wandered off somewhere. No worries though!
descriptions.405: That method won't work here. Try a different approach!
descriptions.406: The format's not quite right. Want to try another one?
descriptions.408: Things took a bit too long. Let's try again!
descriptions.409: There's a small conflict happening. Refresh and it should be fine!
descriptions.410: This content's gone for good. Time to find something new!
descriptions.413: That's a lot of data! Try sending a bit less?
descriptions.429: Whoa, slow down there! Take a breather and try again in a moment.
descriptions.500: Oops, something went wrong on our end. We're on it!
descriptions.502: Having trouble connecting. Give it a sec and try again!
descriptions.503: Taking a quick break. Be back soon!
descriptions.504: The connection timed out. Let's give it another shot!
descriptions.default: An error occurred, but it's all good!
